header.title: Report a Missing Person
header.subtitle: Complete all sections to file a report

privacy.title: Privacy Notice
privacy.body: Information collected will be shared with law enforcement agencies as required. By submitting this form, you consent to the processing of this data in accordance with Quebec privacy laws.

reporter.title: Your Information
reporter.subtitle: We need your details to verify and follow up on this report

missingPerson.title: Missing Person Details
missingPerson.subtitle: Provide as much information as possible about the missing person
missingPerson.distinguishingHelp: Tattoos, scars, birthmarks, clothing last seen wearing
missingPerson.photoHelper: Click to upload or drag and drop

circumstances.title: Circumstances of Disappearance
circumstances.subtitle: Details about when and where the person was last seen
circumstances.circumstancesHelp: What was the person doing? Was this out of character?
circumstances.outOfCharacter: Is this disappearance out of character?
circumstances.unverifiedNotesHelp: Add observations that are unconfirmed or still being verified.

contacts.title: Known Contacts & Social Media
contacts.subtitle: Help us locate friends and monitor online activity
contacts.emailsHelp: Enter each email on a new line
contacts.phonesHelp: Enter each number on a new line
contacts.friendsHelp: People who might know their whereabouts

risks.title: Risk Assessment
risks.subtitle: This information helps prioritize the search
risks.medicalHelp: Any conditions that require ongoing treatment
risks.medicationsHelp: List medications they need to take regularly
risks.threatsHelp: Are there people who might want to harm this person?
risks.suicidal: Is there any concern about self-harm or suicidal ideation?

languageSection.reporterDescription: This helps us communicate with you effectively and connect you with appropriate support services.
languageSection.reporterLanguagesPlaceholder: Select all languages you can communicate in
languageSection.subjectDescription: Understanding what languages the missing person speaks helps with community outreach and communication if they are found.
languageSection.subjectPrimaryLabel: Primary languages spoken by the missing person
languageSection.subjectPrimaryPlaceholder: Select languages the missing person speaks
languageSection.subjectRespondsPlaceholder: Select languages they might respond to if approached
languageSection.subjectRespondsHelp: This is helpful for search teams and community outreach. Include languages they understand even if they don't speak them fluently.
languageSection.subjectOfficialLabel: Can communicate in English or French
languageSection.subjectOfficialHelp: This helps determine if language-specific outreach or translators may be needed during the search.

review.title: Review Your Report
review.subtitle: Please review all information before submitting
review.confirmText: I confirm that all information provided is accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand this report will be shared with law enforcement.

success.title: Thank you for submitting this report
success.subtitle: Our response team will review the details and coordinate next steps.

nextSteps.first: A coordinator will validate the details and may reach out for clarification.
nextSteps.second: We will notify relevant agencies and assign a response team.
nextSteps.third: You can monitor updates in your case dashboard.
